task.title: Add data warehouse user group
task.shortdesc: Steps that describe how administrators can enable data warehouse reporting access to a group of users.

step.cmd: In the Define User Group section, type a name in the Group Name field. provide the following group information:
Type a description in the Group Description field.
In the Report Suite Access section, select the report suites that you want group members to be able to access.

info.p: Alternatively, click Customize, then enable Custom Data Warehouse Report.

step.cmd: Under Assign User Logins, add the desired user logins.

info.p: The next time the users added to this group log in, they will see the data warehouse option added to the Reports & Analytics menu.

info.note: In case of conflicting permissions (such as a user assigned to two groups, one of which denies access to a feature and the other grants that same access), the system restricts permission. Users who belong to groups that deny data warehouse access may need to be removed from those groups.
